name: Memphis Rap
description: Minimalistic half-time drum machine programming with droning bass, often paired with aggressive rapping and a double time flow.

children.name: Dungeon Rap
children.description: Combines the dark production of Memphis Rap with the fantasy aesthetics and sound design of Dungeon Synth.

children.name: Phonk
children.description: Modernized, eclectic take on classic Memphis Rap production, featuring various influences from other Hip Hop genres, especially drum programming inspired by other Southern Hip Hop as well as frequent jazzy, funky elements somewhat akin to West Coast Hip Hop and from Electronic music.
